JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish speaking Content Moderator, Lisbon, Portugal
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Work International, Stockholm, Sweden, is looking for a Danish Content Moderator, Lisbon, Portugal.

Work And Thrive In Lisbon!

How would you feel if your office was just a breath away from beaches with crystal-clear waters? Does 300 days of sunshine – along with flavourful Portuguese cuisine – sound like an option you’d like to explore? – Lisbon is the answer!

A vibrant and charismatic city, and one of the finest capital cities in Europe. The city boasts a glorious climate, lively nightlife, historic monuments, and a range of activities that will entertain visitors of all ages and dispositions. There is a lot to see and do – come and join our ever-growing Content Moderator team in Lisbon!

Job Description

As a Content Moderator, you will play a pivotal role in maintaining the integrity of Social Media by ensuring that posts align with community standards. Working alongside our established team of Dutch speakers and in collaboration with colleagues across 14 other markets, you’ll help create a safe and enjoyable space for users.

Your Responsibilities as a Content Moderator:
  • Assess and respond to user-reported content that may be offensive or disturbing, following client policies and guidelines.
  • Review, block, and delete content that violates community standards.
  • Deliver high-quality work with attention to detail.
  • Directly contribute to reducing hate, racism, bullying, cybercrimes, and misinformation online.




The job comes with:
  • Inspiring Work Atmosphere: Join a fast-growing global organization in Lisbon’s modern and convenient office spaces.
  • Career Growth & Learning: Access ongoing training and development to boost your skills and advance your career.
  • Relocation Support: Enjoy a generous relocation package with support to make your move smooth and stress-free.
  • Competitive Salary & Bonuses: Fixed salary, performance bonuses, and a language premium to reward your hard work.
  • Perks & Allowances: Meal allowance, transportation support, and free coffee, tea, and fresh fruit at the office.
  • Exciting Opportunity: Be part of a vibrant, international team making a difference in a dynamic work environment.




Your profile:
  • Very good level of the Danish language (at least C1 level) + B2 level of English
  • Excellent communication (verbal and written) and interpersonal skills
  • Excellent organizational and time management skills
  • Strong attention to detail and a desire to deliver accurately, efficiently, and to a high standard
  • Have a neutral mindset to alternative video content that needs classification
  • Has work permit visa for Portugal or an EU-passport!




Living and working In Portugal

Offers a fantastic mix of affordability, safety, and lifestyle perks. With its mild climate, beautiful coastlines, and low cost of living, Portugal is an ideal destination for expats. The healthcare and education systems are well-developed, and tax incentives make relocation even more attractive. Most locals speak English, making it easy to settle in. Additionally, many employers provide a tax-free meal allowance, enhancing your take-home benefits. Enjoy a relaxed, welcoming atmosphere while building your career in a stunning setting!

About our Client:

Our client, is a global leader in digital services with a mission to combine cutting-edge technology and human empathy for enhanced customer care. With nearly 500,000 team members speaking over 300 languages worldwide, they are committed to making a positive impact on local communities, customers, and the environment.

Apply in 30 seconds and our recruiters will be in touch with you within 48h!

Read more about the vacancy and apply online:

https://www.workinternational.com/job/danish-content-moderator-lisbon-portugal-%e2%ad%90/





Work International is a Nordic recruitment agency that helps people find, apply, and land their dream jobs abroad. Through partnerships with world-leading employers, we offer safe working conditions, attractive relocation packages and amazing work opportunities.

https://www.workinternational.com
